IRPact_modellierung.distributions

Class SpatialDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.Distribution
      • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.SpatialDistribution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContinuousSpatialDistribution, DummySpatialDistribution

    public abstract class SpatialDistribution
extends Distribution
    Abstraction to model distributions with values in (2 dimensional) space. Values are taken in coordinate space with double coordinates
